column4: So umm... I have a stuck setup thing in apt-get, and no matter how long I leave it running, it won't finish, and if I cancel it, it tries to do it again (unsuccessfully) with dpkg --configure -a ... How do I make it give up installing a package?
apt-get just retries to finish it, and refuses to work until it finishes which it won't.
apt-get wont retry if you kill it good
